name: Problematic Powers
description:
Story

You are a mutated human that wants to save his friend Pablo from jail

Controls:
  • WASD - move
  • Left click - attack
  • X - change powers (ice / fire)
  • F - fullscreen on / off
Goal:
  • You must defeat all enemies
  • There are 2 waves
  • First wave - you must defeat 10 enemies (without gunmans)
  • Second wave - you must defeat 25 enemies (with gunmans)
Warning:
  • There is temperature bar
  • If it’s colder , you are slower
  • If it’s warmer , you take more damage
  • Too cold or too warm equals dead
